name: Fruity Energy Bites
author: Emergen-C(R)
summary: These energy bites combine Emergen-C® Protein Fuel & Superfoods Pomegranate Mango, dried fruits, and nut butter for a delicious snack that's packed with protein in every bite. Chopped cashews are the finishing touch to add a satisfying crunch.
ingredients: 2 scoops Emergen-C® Protein Fuel & Superfoods Pomegranate Mango
½ cup cashew butter, or more to taste
¼ cup finely chopped roasted cashews
directions: Place dates and mango in a blender or food processor; pulse until very finely chopped
Add Emergen-C® Protein Fuel & Super Foods Pomegranate Mango; pulse to combine
Add cashew butter and salt; pulse until well-combined and almost smooth
Using your hands, roll 1 tablespoon of mixture into a ball, then roll ball in chopped cashews to coat
Repeat with remaining date mixture and cashews
